title: Which soundtracks were used for the starting credits of various seasons of MasterChef Australia, 1 through 8? - Quora

response.answer_text: Masterchef, just like many other reality TV shows tend to use stock library music throughout the production. However, the signature song is usually a production-specific track. For example, Katy Perry has sung the theme for a number of series (Hot and Cold) but this isn’t a general release track. It’s a production track that is copyright Endemol Shine, so it’s probably a special track just made for the show.
